ctx: intros Q a b c d p0 q r t H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) a, b, c, d : Term A n p0, q, r, t : list (Term A n) H1 : Reducep Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) c r) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) d t) H2 : Reducep Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) d t) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) H3 : Confluent Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) c r) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) d t) H4 : Confluent Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) d t) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) H5 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p0) H6 : canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) d t) The term "H3" has type "Confluent Q (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p0) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) c r) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) d t)" while it is expected to have type "list (Term A n)".

original: intros Q a b c d p0 q r t H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6. apply Conf_inv1 with (nZb:=H1) (nZc:=H2) (p:=H3) (q:=H4) (r:=H5) (r1:=r) (s1:=q). - apply canonical_spminusf_full_t. - apply H4. - apply H3. - auto.
